document.title: The Interaction of Botanicals and AMPK Signaling in the Inhibition of Castrate-Resistant Prostate Cancer
document.abstract: Reprogramming of metabolic pathways and abnormal acetylation of DNA are two common features of cancer, including prostate cancer (PCa).

field.name: custom_citation
field.value: Whelan, J. & Zhao, Y. (2014). The interaction of botanicals and AMPK signaling in the inhibition of castrate-resistant prostate cancer. Cancer and Metabolism, 2, 85. doi:10.1186/2049-3002-2-S1-P85
